name: Spacetime Rift
description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.
source: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for **10** seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to **0%** of ATK to targets caught in the area every **0.5** seconds. Cooldown: **100** seconds.

advancement.description: Enemies caught within the rift who are close to the ground are unable to dodge, and the vacuum duration is increased to **15** seconds.
Increase damage dealt to targets in the area by **20%**.
Reduce flame damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Enemies within the rift are unable to receive any healing.
